title: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos,  California", 1968–69
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on white paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite above Hebrew word (haadama):  of the earth (soil); each Hebrew character accompanied by a number in graphite, reading from right to left:  4,1,3,10,4 [all encircled]; in pen and black ink, below Hebrew words:  Blessing
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: A Hebrew word ( V'nivrechu) which translate as, "and he will bless..."

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos,  California", 1968–69.
1968–69. Pen and black ink, graphite on white paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-77-a.
